languages.text: В движениях Жертвы есть странность — она то стремится прочь, то замирает. Мои зрачки, измененные рецептропином, великолепно улавливают движение, но хуже различают неподвижные объекты. И добыче моей как будто об этом известно!

There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!
languages.original_text: В движениях Жертвы есть странность — она то стремится прочь, то замирает. Мои зрачки, измененные рецептропином, великолепно улавливают движение, но хуже различают неподвижные объекты. И добыче моей как будто об этом известно!

traits.locale_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey — it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are great at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary objects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey — it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are great at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary objects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!
traits.speaker: Player

traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are great at detecting movement but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!

traits.locale_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!

traits.locale_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 獲物は奇妙な動きをしている。猛然と走り出したかと思うと、次の瞬間には固まる。私のレセプタートロピンで変化した瞳孔は、動きを感知するのに長けているが、静止した被写体を感知するのは苦手だ。私の獲物はそのことに気づいているようだ！
languages.original_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!

traits.locale_text: 獲物は奇妙な動きをしている。猛然と走り出したかと思うと、次の瞬間には固まる。私のレセプタートロピンで変化した瞳孔は、動きを感知するのに長けているが、静止した被写体を感知するのは苦手だ。私の獲物はそのことに気づいているようだ！
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 猎物的动作似乎非常古怪，它一会儿飞奔而逃，一会儿又静止不动。我的瞳孔经过生物生成素改造，很擅长探测运动的物体，但并不太擅长感知静止不动的物体。我的猎物似乎意识到了这一点！
languages.original_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!

traits.locale_text: 猎物的动作似乎非常古怪，它一会儿飞奔而逃，一会儿又静止不动。我的瞳孔经过生物生成素改造，很擅长探测运动的物体，但并不太擅长感知静止不动的物体。我的猎物似乎意识到了这一点！
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Los movimientos de la presa son extraños: primero corre y al segundo se queda inmóvil. Mis pupilas, alteradas con receptotropinas, detectan el movimiento a la perfección, pero perciben peor los objetos inmóviles, ¡y mi presa parece ser consciente de ello!
languages.original_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!

traits.locale_text: Los movimientos de la presa son extraños: primero corre y al segundo se queda inmóvil. Mis pupilas, alteradas con receptotropinas, detectan el movimiento a la perfección, pero perciben peor los objetos inmóviles, ¡y mi presa parece ser consciente de ello!
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Die Bewegungen der Beute muten merkwürdig an, als sie flieht und im nächsten Moment plötzlich erstarrt. Meine vom Rezeptotropin veränderten Pupillen sind gute darin, Bewegungen zu erkennen, tun sich jedoch mit der Wahrnehmung stationärer Dinge schwerer. Und meine Beute scheint das zu wissen!
languages.original_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!

traits.locale_text: Die Bewegungen der Beute muten merkwürdig an, als sie davonsprintet und im nächsten Moment plötzlich erstarrt. Meine vom Rezeptotropin veränderten Pupillen sind hervorragend darin, Bewegungen zu erkennen, tun sich jedoch mit der Wahrnehmung stationärer Dinge schwerer. Und meine Beute scheint das zu wissen!
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: La proie se déplace de la plus étrange des manières : un moment, elle file à toute vitesse, et l'instant d'après, elle se fige sur place. Mes pupilles réceptotropinées me permettent de mieux percevoir les mouvements, mais limitent ma capacité à déceler les éléments stationnaires. Et ma proie semble le savoir !
languages.original_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!

traits.locale_text: La proie se déplace de la plus étrange des manières : un moment, elle file à toute vitesse, et l'instant d'après, elle se fige sur place. Mes pupilles réceptotropinées me permettent de mieux percevoir les mouvements, mais limitent ma capacité à déceler les éléments stationnaires. Et ma proie semble le savoir !
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Avımın hareketlerinde bir tuhaflık var. İleri doğru atılırken bir anda durup donakalıyor. Algıtorpin ile farklılaştırılmış göz bebeklerim, hareketleri tespit etmek konusunda çok iyi olsa da sabit özneleri algılamada normalden daha kötü. Avım bunun farkına varmış gibi görünüyor!
languages.original_text: There is a strangeness to the movements of the Prey as it dashes away one moment and freezes the next. My receptotropin-altered pupils are adept at detecting movement, but they are worse at perceiving stationary subjects. And my Prey seems to be aware of this!

traits.locale_text: Av'ın hareketlerinde bir tuhaflık var. İleri doğru atılırken bir anda duruyor ve donakalıyor. Algıtorpin ile geliştirilmiş göz bebeklerim, hareketleri tespit etmek konusunda çok iyidir ancak sabit özneleri algılamak konusunda normalden daha kötüdür. Av'ım bunun farkına varmış gibi görünüyor!
traits.speaker: Player
